name: Camacho - Distillery Edition - Connecticut Edition Toro
additionalNotes: They took the rare leaf and aged it for 6 months in charred bourbon barrels to draw out even more flavor and complexity, and called it the Camacho Distillery Edition. The Distillery Edition comes in just one 6” x 50 toro size with your choice of three familiar, but amped-up blends. The Connecticut, Corojo, and Ecuador have all been meticulously reblended, all utilizing the sweet, complex barrel-aged Corojo, adding a whole new dimension to the flavor profiles you know & love.
